fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__BURNING DROPKICK__]: Requires 1 Combo. Dropkick a player, reducing their defense by one stage. If you would reduce their defense past Vulnerable, gain 1 Combo and attack them. Does not affect the other Fighter, and will inform you if you attempted to Dropkick them.
- [__SHOT PUT__]: Requires 2 Combo. Throw a heavy ball at a player, which they will be informed of. Tomorrow night, you will attack them astrally. Gain 1 Combo if you kill them.
- [__THRUST UPPERCUT__]: Spend [1] Combo. Visit a player, reduce the defenses of that player and their other visitors by one stage. Gain 1 Combo if you reduced the defense of more than one player.
- Overdrive (__OMEGA BLITZ__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
